schemes.title: Government Schemes for Farmers
schemes.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest government initiatives and financial support programs available to you.

pm-kisan.title: PM-KISAN Scheme
pm-kisan.description: Financial support of â‚¹6,000 per year for small and marginal farmers.
pm-kisan.benefits: Direct income support in three equal installments.

pmfby.title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
pmfby.description: Insurance coverage against crop failure due to natural calamities, pests, or diseases.
pmfby.eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.
pmfby.benefits: Stabilizes income and encourages adoption of innovative farming practices.

kcc.title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
kcc.description: Provides farmers with timely access to credit for their cultivation and other needs.
kcc.eligibility: Farmers, animal husbandry, and fisheries farmers.
kcc.benefits: Low-interest loans, flexible repayment, and a simple application process.
